title: Paired Sources African Women and Islam Q2

content.question: Which of the following historical developments in the period 1750–1900 best explains the attitudes toward women in Muslim societies expressed by the authors of the two sources?

choices.label: Challenges to existing political and social hierarchies
Criticisms of the political authority of wealthy elites
Arguments about the benefits of free trade for economic growth
Acceptance of globalism’s effects on moral behavior

content.answer: Challenges to existing political and social hierarchies

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
